question.text: The figure shows a  current-carrying square loop ABCD of side 10 cm and current i=10 A. The magnetic moment M →  of the loop is

options.text: <math> <mrow> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <mtext>0.05</mtext> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>i</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> <mo>-</mo> <msqrt> <mn>3</mn> </msqrt> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>k</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mtext>A </mtext>  <msup> <mtext>m</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </math>

<math> <mrow> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <mtext>0.05</mtext> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>j</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> <mo>+</mo> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>k</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mtext>A </mtext> <msup><mtext>m</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </math>

<math> <mrow> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <mtext>0.05</mtext> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <msqrt> <mn>3</mn> </msqrt> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>i</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> <mo>+</mo> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>k</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mtext>A </mtext> <msup><mtext>m</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </math>

<math> <mrow> <mfenced close=")" open="(" separators=","> <mrow> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>i</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> <mo>+</mo> <mover accent="true"> <mtext>k</mtext> <mo>^</mo> </mover> </mrow> </mfenced> <mspace width="0.5em"></mspace> <mtext>A </mtext> <msup><mtext>m</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </math>

solution.text:
Areal vectors will be ⊥ to the plane.
Area vector is at 6 0 o  angle with x-axis and 3 0 o  angle with -z-axis.

M → = NI A →

M → = 1 0 × 1 0 - 2 A  m 2

M = 0 · 1 A  m 2

M→=Mxi^-Mzk^=Mcos60i^-Mcos30ok^

M → = 0.05 i ^ - 3 k ^
